EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Information (1328221177.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Information (1328221177.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Harry,
Thank you for following up with me! Before I send you the enrollment information I need to know whether you will be working with BAH or with another company that you were working on getting a contract with? This will determine what enrollment link I send you and if you will be forwarded to an enrollment manager on the BAH team. Please let me know and we can always follow up on another short call to talk about details.
Please follow my calendar link from earlier emails to schedule a time if you would like to speak or just give me a call sometime tomorrow.
I look forward to hearing from you!
Have a great evening, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Roberta Bakken [mailto:hbbakken@gmail.com] Sent: Thursday, February 02, 2012 11:29 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Information
Nicholette,
Good Morning! Well, we have made some good progress this week and I think we're ready to enroll me into your program. I suspect that we'll need to set up another call to work the details so I will enter into your scheduler to select a time for my Wife and I to chat with you.
We look forward to the next steps...
R/Harry Bakken On Wed, Jan 25, 2012 at 4:12 PM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote: Hi Harry,
You are very welcome! I look forward to hearing from you soon.
Have a great day, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com

From: Roberta Bakken [mailto:hbbakken@gmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, January 25, 2012 3:59 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Information
Nicolette,
Thanks for all of this information. I'll need a day or so to sort through it. I'll call you with questions by weeks end.
Thanks again, Harry On Tue, Jan 24, 2012 at 12:24 PM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote:
Hi Harry,
It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’ve enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful in finding your next project.
We have created an index of past webinars on topics specifically catered for independent consultants. You can view our index by going here. In addition we have a 2012 Webinar track that will cover everything to do with working independently. We have three tracks, you can sign up to receive notifications when new webinars are scheduled by going here. Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke over the phone by going here. If you have questions before then, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule.
Best of luck finding your next contract,
Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
